channel.title: trio-quarterly on Trio
channel.description: Recent content in trio-quarterly on Trio

item.title: Trio Quarterly - 2021/10 -> 2021/12
item.description: This is the Q4 2021 edition of the Trio Quarterly newsletter, replacing the old Monthly one as a quarterly schedule is a better fit for the project. If you wish to get your library featured in a Trio Monthly post, please contact me on Matrix (@lura:veriny.tf), or ping me in the Gitter (same username). Any Trio-related project is welcome! Trio Library OpenSSL 3.0 support The unforgiving passage of linear time comes for us all, including OpenSSL.
